HOME_DIR=/Volumes/Alter/Daus_WGS_Paper
ALN_DIR=${HOME_DIR}/Alignments/WGS
REF_DIR=${HOME_DIR}/References
WORKING_DIR=${HOME_DIR}/Analyses/AnalysingWGSCoverage

cd ${WORKING_DIR}

# Combine mosdepth output files generated by SnakefileAlignmentWGS

for FILE in $(awk 'NR > 1 {print $1}' ${REF_DIR}/wgs_sample_details.txt)
do

gzcat ${FILE}.regions.bed.gz | awk -v FILE=${FILE} '{print$0"\t"FILE}' >> coverage_counts.txt

done

# Now run plotting script

Rscript plotting.R
